pull.title: fuzz: Avoid timeout in bitdeque fuzz target
pull.body: I'd guess that any bug should be discoverable within `10` ops. However, `900` seems also better than no limit at all, which causes timeouts such as https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=50892

events.body:
ACK fa4ba04c157b83b827f7541fa007710bd6211fe7

No need for the fuzzing loop to continue forever.
@MarcoFalke are you going to backport this?

issue.title: [24.x] fuzz: Avoid timeout in bitdeque fuzz target
issue.body:
Identical commit from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26012

Not strictly required for 24.x, but I guess it can't hurt to avoid timeouts.
